Summary: Round approx. 200 ft dia. probably 1200-1400 feet in air silent, lt. blue light in center surrounded on preiphery by smaller blue lights
trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh

This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI took our dog out to do her business before retiring for the evening. I happened to look up and saw what appeared to be a weird circular formation of stars. As I watched, I realized it was one big object and there were smaller light blue lights on the object's periphery slowly revolving around a bigger light blue light in the center. I ran in the house, grabbed my digital camera, turned the flash off and took a quick picture. As I was preparing to take a second shot, the UFO disappeared straight up in the sky at an unbelievable speed. Location: my back driveway Camera: Canon Powershot S-50 5.0 megapixel Object: was moving south-east to north-west at a very slow rate directly over our neighborhood Noise: absolutely none Feelings: surprised, intrigued
